Hello. I'm Ramesh

I help people make sense of data. I have built data warehouses and worked on BI projects. Recently, I have started with Python and the awesome data analysis pack (Numpy / Scikit / Pandas).
I attend conferences to meet people who have built applications or work in data science. I hope to get there very shortly and plan to use this blog space to share my thoughts and ideas.
Reach me @sampathweb in twitter / github or mail me ramesh at sampathweb.com
Coming soon in March'2013.
